block.p: SCHNEIDER-Nathan on Monday, July 17, 2000. Nathan of Pembroke Pines, FL (formerly of Brooklyn, NY). Beloved husband of Theresa (nee Greenberg), loving father of George, Ian and Joel Schneider, cherished grandfather of eight grandchildren. Funeral services the Menorah Chapels at Millburn, 2950 Vaux Hall Road, Union, NJ on Wednesday, July 19, 2000 at 1:00 PM. Interment in the Beth Israel Cemetery, Woodbridge, NJ.
